org.jsfml.window.event

Class JoystickEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.window.event.Event
      • org.jsfml.window.event.JoystickEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JoystickButtonEvent, JoystickMoveEvent

    public class JoystickEvent
extends Event
    Represents generic joystick or gamepad events.

    Objects of this class are created for events of type Event.Type.JOYSTICK_CONNECETED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_DISCONNECTED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_PRESSED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_RELEASED or Event.Type.JOYSTICK_MOVED.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.jsfml.window.event.Event

        Event.Type

    • Field Detail

      • joystickId

        public final int joystickId
        The index of the joystick that caused this event.

        The value is guaranteed to range between 0 (inclusive) and Joystick.JOYSTICK_COUNT (exclusive).

    • Constructor Detail

      • JoystickEvent

        public JoystickEvent(int type,
             int joystickId)
        Constructs a new joystick event.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the event. This must be a valid ordinal in the Event.Type enumeration.
        joystickId - the joystick ID.

    • Method Detail

      • asJoystickEvent

        public JoystickEvent asJoystickEvent()
        Description copied from class: Event
        Attempts to cast this event to a JoystickEvent.
        Overrides:
        asJoystickEvent in class Event
        Returns:
        the event cast to a JoystickEvent if its type is one of Event.Type.JOYSTICK_CONNECETED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_DISCONNECTED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_PRESSED, Event.Type.JOYSTICK_BUTTON_RELEASED or Event.Type.JOYSTICK_MOVED, null otherwise.
